resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1046</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Country Facts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land-Tatsachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faits de Pays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatos Do País</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fatti Del Paese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονότα χώρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hechos Del País</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the learners will learn the basic facts of little-known countries. They will locate the countries on a world map and compare the distances between different countries.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">country facts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">world map</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität erlernen die Anfänger die 
grundlegenden Tatsachen der wenig bekannten Länder. Sie 
errichten die Länder auf einer Weltkarte und vergleichen die 
Abstände zwischen unterschiedlichen Ländern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants apprendront 
les faits de base des pays peu connus. Ils plac les pays sur une
carte du monde et compareront les distances entre différents pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners aprenderão os fatos 
básicos de países little-known. Ficarão os países em um mapa
do mundo e compararão as distâncias entre países diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività i principianti impareranno i 
fatti di base dei paesi poco noto. Posizioneranno i paesi su un 
programma del mondo e confronteranno le distanze fra i paesi 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν τα 
βασικά γεγονότα των little-known χωρών. Θα εντοπίσουν τις
χώρες σε έναν παγκόσμιο χάρτη και θα συγκρίνουν τις αποστάσεις 
μεταξύ των διαφορετικών χωρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes aprenderán 
los hechos básicos de países poco conocidos. Establecerán los
países en una correspondencia del mundo y compararán las distancias 
entre diversos países.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landtatsachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltkarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">faits de pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte du monde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fatos do país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapa do mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fatti del paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma del mondo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεγονότα χωρών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παγκόσμιος χάρτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hechos del país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencia del mundo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
